overview:
Joey is a proven marketing and advertising executive turned digital entrepreneur.

Prior to launching Peer Squared. He served as Senior Vice President of Strategy at Emmy Award winning Marketing and Advertising agency, Creative Asylum. There he headed strategic development of integrated marketing solutions for a wide array of entertainment, lifestyle, Fortune 1000 companies and other high-profile brands. Joey, an expert in Social Media marketing, also launched Creative Asylumâ€™s Social Media group and specializes in campaigns that involve digital and social elements. This experience led him to conceive the initial idea for the Peer Squared platform. Joeyâ€™s past experience includes serving as an executive at cutting-edge companies including Guidance, Alloy, Flixer and A.D.D. Marketing and Advertising. He has launched groundbreaking campaigns for clients including FOX, WB, Universal Pictures, Sony, EA Mobile, Hilton Prestige Portfolio, Nickelodeon, Disney and MTV / VH-1.
